annonstext:
Are you a curious, experienced Android Developer with a good grip of the latest Java or Kotlin programming languages? Would you also be interested to take technical lead in the area at i3tex? Get in touch, this might be the right challenge for you!

i3tex is a value-driven technology consultant company and together with our customers, we develop products that simplify and enrich people's everyday lives in an innovative and sustainable way. i3tex consist of technical consultants who possess the drive and desire to do things differently and we share the ambition to make the world better through technical innovations and product development. Have you for example heard about our way of making the work towards the vision measurable? Read more; (https://www.i3tex.com/om-i3tex/battre-varld/) Better World Index, i3tex (https://www.i3tex.com/om-i3tex/battre-varld/)

We believe in a strong business culture, to grow together and to have a lot of fun along the way! Today, we are 170 employees in six offices around Sweden. The customers are in Automotive, Medical Technology, IT & Digital Solutions, Aerospace and Industry. The three i:s in i3tex stands for innovate, implement and improve.

We are looking for an experienced Android Developer with deep knowledge in android software development and with an interest to work in different industries. In addition, you will be involved in the work to further develop the team and encourage a healthy knowledge transfer at i3tex.

We hope you will shine in the following areas:

- 5+ work experience within Android development using Java and Kotlin
- Agile mindset
- Logic thinking and troubleshooting
- An interest for UX/UI
- University degree in computer science or similar
- Good knowledge in Swedish and English

If you want to know more about the job position or i3tex, please contact Business Unit Manager FIRSTNAME LASTNAME. If you have questions regarding the labor unions, please contact one of our labor union representatives by  TELEPHONENO .

Welcome with your application!

Contact

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO
